=============================================================================
You've just successfully installed Ucommerce for Umbraco 8.
=============================================================================
Thank you for installing Ucommerce!

Learn the ins and outs of Ucommerce whenever you’d like – see the training videos on https://academy.ucommerce.net/
 

Remember, we are here to help:

Do you need help with a client case with specific e-commerce requirements, please don’t hesitate to reach out, we would love to help: mail: sales@ucommerce.net or by phone: +45 61 799 997

 
Please report feature requests to feedback@ucommerce.net
Please report any bugs to support@ucommerce.net

Once again, thank you for installing Ucommerce, we hope you’ll find the platform as agile and growth-oriented as we do.
=============================================================================
